main event: A fast-moving, jet black object was observed circling slowly, then accelerating to over 1,300 mph in 3 seconds before making an abrupt turn and disappearing from sight.
interesting points: The object initially looked like a sheet of foil circling slowly.
It then burst of speed to 1,000 mph in 3 seconds, much faster than nearby jet contrails at 37,000 feet.
The object made an abrupt turn and accelerated rapidly out of sight.
The observation lasted 9-10 seconds and was described as unusual and spectacular.
The object was observed at an altitude of around 2,000 feet.
